title: FY25 Benefits Enrollment
description: Annual benefits enrollment for Fiscal Year 2025. Please review and confirm your benefit selections.

sections.heading: Benefits Enrollment for FY25
sections.content:
Welcome to your Annual Benefits Enrollment for Fiscal Year 2025 (April 2025 - March 2026).

This enrollment period allows you to review and update your benefit elections for the upcoming year. Please carefully review all options and make your selections before the deadline.

sections.heading: Health Insurance Options
sections.content:
**Medical Coverage Plans:**

**Option 1: Platinum Plan**
- Premium: ₹3,500/month (employee portion)
- Deductible: ₹10,000 annually
- Coverage: 100% after deductible
- Family coverage included

**Option 2: Gold Plan (Currently Selected)**
- Premium: ₹2,500/month (employee portion)
- Deductible: ₹25,000 annually
- Coverage: 80% after deductible

**Option 3: Silver Plan**
- Premium: ₹1,500/month (employee portion)
- Deductible: ₹50,000 annually
- Coverage: 70% after deductible

sections.heading: How to Complete Enrollment
sections.content:
**Steps to Complete:**

1. Review all benefit options carefully
2. Make your selections or confirm existing elections
3. Update beneficiary information if needed
4. Review cost summary and impact on take-home pay
5. Sign this document electronically to confirm enrollment

title: Updated IP Policy
description: Updated Intellectual Property Policy. Please review changes and acknowledge acceptance.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property Rights Policy - 2026 Update
sections.content:
This updated Intellectual Property (IP) Policy outlines the ownership, use, and protection of intellectual property created by employees during their employment with ZenX Connect.

**Effective Date:** February 10, 2026
**Policy Version:** 3.0

sections.heading: Company Ownership of IP
sections.content:
**Work Product Ownership:**

ZenX Connect owns all intellectual property created by employees that:
- Relates to company business
- Uses company resources
- Results from assigned duties
- Developed during employment

sections.heading: Employee Rights & Personal Projects
sections.content:
**Employees Retain Ownership of:**
- Personal projects unrelated to company business
- Pre-existing IP brought to employment
- Academic work that doesn't disclose confidential information

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the Updated Intellectual Property Policy (Version 3.0).

title: Code of Conduct Agreement 2026
description: Annual Code of Conduct acknowledgment for all employees.

sections.heading: Code of Conduct Overview
sections.content: As an employee of ZenX Connect, you are expected to maintain the highest standards of professional and ethical conduct. This Code of Conduct outlines the behavioral expectations for all team members.

sections.heading: Professional Behavior
sections.content:
**Expected Behaviors:**
- Treat all colleagues with respect and dignity
- Communicate professionally in all interactions
- Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information
- Report any violations or concerns promptly
- Avoid conflicts of interest
- Comply with all company policies and applicable laws

sections.heading: Prohibited Activities
sections.content:
**The following are strictly prohibited:**
- Harassment or discrimination of any kind
- Misuse of company resources or information
- Acceptance of bribes or kickbacks
- Insider trading or securities violations
- Falsification of records or reports
- Violence or threats in the workplace

sections.heading: Reporting Violations
sections.content:
**How to Report:**
- Contact your manager or HR immediately
- Use the anonymous ethics hotline: 1800-XXX-XXXX
- Email: ethics@zenxconnect.com
- No retaliation for good-faith reports

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I have read, understood, and agree to comply with ZenX Connect's Code of Conduct. I understand that violations may result in disciplinary action.

title: Remote Work Agreement
description: Agreement for remote/hybrid work arrangements and responsibilities.

sections.heading: Remote Work Arrangement
sections.content: This agreement outlines the terms and conditions for your remote work arrangement with ZenX Connect. Remote work is a privilege that requires mutual trust and accountability.

sections.heading: Work Schedule and Availability
sections.content:
**Your Responsibilities:**
- Maintain regular work hours as agreed with your manager
- Be available during core business hours (10 AM - 4 PM)
- Respond to messages within 2 hours during work hours
- Attend all required meetings
- Keep your calendar updated
- Log work hours accurately in timesheet system

sections.heading: Home Office Requirements
sections.content:
**Required Setup:**
- Dedicated workspace free from distractions
- Reliable high-speed internet (minimum 25 Mbps)
- Professional background for video calls
- Ergonomic setup (desk, chair, lighting)
- Secure location for company equipment

sections.heading: Equipment and Security
sections.content:
**Company-Provided Equipment:**
- Laptop/desktop computer
- Monitor (upon request)
- Headset for calls
- VPN access credentials

**Your Responsibilities:**
- Maintain equipment in good condition
- Use VPN for all company network access
- Keep devices secure and locked when not in use
- Return all equipment upon separation

sections.heading: Performance and Accountability
sections.content:
**Expectations:**
- Same productivity and quality standards as office work
- Meet all deadlines and deliverables
- Maintain regular communication with team
- Weekly one-on-one check-ins with manager
- Quarterly performance reviews

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I acknowledge and agree to comply with all terms of this Remote Work Agreement. I understand that failure to meet expectations may result in termination of remote work privileges.

title: Data Privacy & GDPR Consent
description: Consent for processing of personal data and GDPR compliance acknowledgment.

sections.heading: Data Privacy Notice
sections.content: ZenX Connect is committed to protecting your personal data and complying with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).

sections.heading: Data We Collect
sections.content:
**Personal Information:**
- Name, employee ID, contact details
- Employment history and performance records
- Salary and benefits information
- Attendance and timesheet data
- Training and certification records
- Health information (for benefits administration)
- Emergency contact information

sections.heading: How We Use Your Data
sections.content:
**Purposes:**
- Employment administration and payroll processing
- Benefits enrollment and management
- Performance evaluation and career development
- Compliance with legal and regulatory requirements
- Internal communications and collaboration
- Security and access control

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content:
**Under GDPR, you have the right to:**
- Access your personal data
- Request correction of inaccurate data
- Request deletion of data (subject to legal requirements)
- Object to processing of your data
- Request data portability
- Withdraw consent (where applicable)
- Lodge a complaint with supervisory authority

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content:
**We protect your data through:**
- Encryption of sensitive information
- Access controls and authentication
- Regular security audits and assessments
- Employee training on data protection
- Secure backup and disaster recovery procedures

sections.heading: Contact Information
sections.content:
**Data Protection Officer:**
Email: dpo@zenxconnect.com
Phone: +91-XXXX-DPO-TEAM

For any questions or concerns about your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Officer.

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I consent to ZenX Connect processing my personal data as described in this notice. I understand my rights under GDPR and data protection laws.

title: IT Acceptable Use Policy
description: Policy governing acceptable use of company IT resources and equipment.

sections.heading: Acceptable Use Policy
sections.content: This policy defines acceptable use of ZenX Connect's information technology resources, including computers, networks, email, internet access, and software.

sections.heading: Permitted Use
sections.content:
**Company IT resources may be used for:**
- Business-related activities and communications
- Professional development and training
- Reasonable personal use during breaks (email, news, personal banking)
- Authorized remote access to company systems

sections.heading: Prohibited Activities
sections.content:
**The following are strictly prohibited:**
- Accessing, downloading, or distributing illegal content
- Harassment, discrimination, or offensive communications
- Installing unauthorized software or hardware
- Attempting to bypass security controls
- Sharing passwords or access credentials
- Using company resources for personal business ventures
- Excessive personal use that interferes with work
- Downloading copyrighted material without authorization

sections.heading: Email and Communication
sections.content:
**Email Guidelines:**
- Use professional language and tone
- Do not forward chain letters or spam
- Be cautious of phishing attempts
- Do not send confidential information via unencrypted email
- Company reserves the right to monitor email communications

sections.heading: Internet Usage
sections.content:
**Acceptable Internet Use:**
- Browsing should be primarily work-related
- Avoid visiting inappropriate or risky websites
- Do not stream video excessively (affects bandwidth)
- Social media use should be limited and professional
- Report suspicious websites or downloads to IT

sections.heading: Mobile Devices
sections.content:
**Company-Issued Devices:**
- Protect with strong passwords/biometrics
- Install company MDM (Mobile Device Management) software
- Keep software and apps updated
- Report lost or stolen devices immediately
- Do not jailbreak or root devices

sections.heading: Monitoring and Privacy
sections.content:
**Important Notice:**
ZenX Connect reserves the right to monitor and audit use of company IT resources. Employees should have no expectation of privacy when using company equipment or networks.

sections.heading: Violations and Consequences
sections.content:
**Policy violations may result in:**
- Written warning
- Suspension of IT access privileges
- Termination of employment
- Legal action (for illegal activities)

Report violations to: it-security@zenxconnect.com

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the IT Acceptable Use Policy. I agree to comply with all terms and understand that violations may result in disciplinary action.

title: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
description: Confidentiality and non-disclosure agreement protecting company trade secrets.

sections.heading: Non-Disclosure Agreement
sections.content: This Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) is entered into between ZenX Connect and you, the employee, to protect confidential and proprietary information disclosed during your employment.

sections.heading: Definition of Confidential Information
sections.content:
**Confidential Information includes, but is not limited to:**
- Trade secrets and proprietary technology
- Source code, algorithms, and technical specifications
- Business plans, strategies, and financial information
- Customer lists, contracts, and pricing information
- Product roadmaps and development plans
- Marketing strategies and campaigns
- Employee information and HR records
- Any information marked as "Confidential" or "Proprietary"

sections.heading: Obligations
sections.content:
**You agree to:**
- Keep all Confidential Information strictly confidential
- Not disclose Confidential Information to any third party
- Not use Confidential Information for personal benefit
- Protect Confidential Information with reasonable care
- Return all confidential materials upon termination
- Not remove confidential materials from company premises without authorization

sections.heading: Exclusions
sections.content:
**This NDA does not apply to information that:**
- Is or becomes publicly available through no fault of yours
- Was known to you prior to disclosure by the company
- Is independently developed by you without use of Confidential Information
- Is required to be disclosed by law or court order (with prior notice to company)

sections.heading: Duration
sections.content:
**Confidentiality Period:**
- This agreement remains in effect during your employment
- Obligations continue for 5 years after employment termination
- Trade secret protection continues indefinitely
- Return of materials required immediately upon separation

sections.heading: Consequences of Breach
sections.content:
**Breach of this NDA may result in:**
- Immediate termination of employment
- Injunctive relief to prevent further disclosure
- Monetary damages for losses incurred
- Attorney fees and court costs
- Criminal prosecution (for theft of trade secrets)

The company will pursue all available legal remedies.

sections.heading: Post-Employment Obligations
sections.content:
**After leaving ZenX Connect:**
- You must return all confidential materials
- Delete all company information from personal devices
- Continue to maintain confidentiality
- Not solicit company employees or clients
- Not compete with the company (if non-compete applies)

signatureRequired.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that I have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Non-Disclosure Agreement. I understand the serious consequences of breaching this agreement.
